methods.name: SimplifyTFLoops
methods.logic: Constructor for the SimplifyTFLoops class. Initializes the AdvancedReducer and stores a pointer to the MachineGraph.

methods.name: reducer_name
methods.logic: Returns the name of the reducer, which is "SimplifyTFLoops".

methods.name: Reduce
methods.logic: The main reduction function.  This function processes a node and performs loop simplification by constraining loop nodes to have at most two inputs using additional merges as needed.
